original_title: 2 Kleine Kleutertjes: Een Dag Om Nooit Te Vergeten
overview: Soon Anna (5) and Joey (4) will no longer be the only children in the family, there will be a baby! On the day of the birth they are taken by their uncle to the petting zoo. Here's a little kid that Joey immediately adores and when they escape the petting zoo together, they go on an adventure. Along the way, they all encounter obstacles and learn to join forces and make many new friends.
title: 2 Kleine Kleutertjes: Een Dag Om Nooit Te Vergeten
